results.content:
I really enjoy his way of teaching. Straight to the point, no fluff.
Though he lacks some energy on couple of videos, other than that great.
I also enjoyed the detailed explanation on core features of spring. With the diagrams, plans, i got to understand something that is not easily understandable at least from the official documentation. You can see when a person goes the extra mile and cares about a topic. Keep up the good work.

response.content: Thank you so much! Means a lot :) <3
response.content_html: Thank you so much! Means a lot :) <3
